website_summaries.verdict: This bocce ball set is a great pick for anyone who wants to play the game for fun without spending a lot of money.
pros: An affordable set with balls that feel reasonably sturdy for basic leisure-time play
Great for family fun or teaching novices bocce ball skills
Backed by the company's satisfaction guarantee
cons: Finish on the balls tends to scratch easily

customer_reviews.title: Bocce balls break if they touch
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and used it once at the beach on sand playing with a 7-year old over short distances. One ball hit another and half of its resin just blew off leaving an exposed core. It's too late to return this, but I can't advise anyone buying a bocce set that can't handle ball-ball contact. That's half the game! I expect something sold by Amazon to have a better return policy, and would change this review if they would replace the set [or at least the broken ball].
customer_reviews.author: jorlowitz

customer_reviews.title: I liked the product at first
customer_reviews.text: I liked the product at first. Purchased in April 2018. The third time playing had one of the green balls shatter upon impact with another ball. July 6, 2018. Maybe a onetime product defect but still no use to me now. Hopefully the seller reads this as I am not sure what if any warranty this product has.
customer_reviews.author: Keith H.

customer_reviews.title: ( Would really like a refund if possible and I'll buy a higher ...
customer_reviews.text: Broke one of the red balls on the first throw :( Would really like a refund if possible and I'll buy a higher quality set.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Cole

customer_reviews.title: Poor resin coating
customer_reviews.text: First game we played and the resin cracked on one of the balls. Wish I had read the reviews before I bought this since others has this problem too. Thought since it was a best seller and the average rating was 4 stars it was a sure thing. I will be returning this.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Carroll

customer_reviews.title: one of the balls chipped and broke just like some of the other reviews
customer_reviews.text: The second time I played this, one of the balls chipped and broke just like some of the other reviews. For a game designed to have contact between the balls this is really poor quality. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: DANIEL T GOLDMAN

customer_reviews.title: These were total garbage. They are bocce balls but they are ceramic ...
customer_reviews.text: These were total garbage. They are bocce balls but they are ceramic and break if they bump into each other (which is kind of eh wooing if the game) The ceramic covering broke the first time we used them. The pieces were sharp and could cut someone. Don’t buy this product. If there was a “no star rating” that’s what they would get.
customer_reviews.author: barbara

customer_reviews.title: Inferior quality
customer_reviews.text: We used this product for the first time today. It was a Christmas present for my parents. One ball shattered when hit by another ball. The quality here is not good. I am calling the seller for a refund
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh Spalding

customer_reviews.title: Great set! Perfect for back yard and lawn
customer_reviews.text: Great set! Perfect for back yard and lawn. After reading other reviewers' complaints about the bag falling apart, I noticed when it arrived that a problem is the bag has no structure: the balls don't and can't stack neatly as in the product pictures, but collapse down and pull out the sides. I'm guessing that puts stress on the seams. Realizing this, I saved the inner box that the balls came in inside the bag, tore off the top flaps, and am using the box as an insert. That provides structure and keeps the balls upright. We will see if that makes the bag last. It certainly makes the set easier to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: GTD

customer_reviews.title: Should have read other reviews!!!
customer_reviews.text: Should have read some of the other reviews... Within 10 minutes a playing one of the balls shattered! Balls have a plastic skin around the core - very cheap and obviously prone to shattering. Would not buy this product. Would gladly pay more for a product with a solid ball.
customer_reviews.author: BReid

customer_reviews.title: Solid set, average carrying case - save the box!
customer_reviews.text: Just ordered these as my first bocce set of my own, and they're very good quality. The balls are heavy and solid, and look good too. The only reason I can't give it five stars is that, at least for me, it's really hard to get the balls back into the carrying case, since it's flimsy nylon. That said, there is an easy solution: when you get the product, you will open the carrying and see the balls in a box. I recommend just cutting off the top panels off the box and simply leave it in there, as it will give the carrying case the rigidity needed to easily remove/replace the balls.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: No Pallino?
customer_reviews.text: Do not pay $50 for a bocce set WITHOUT A PALLINO. The price to replace them is half the cost of the entire set. Really disappointed this major detail was seemingly left out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Maple

customer_reviews.title: Great feel but one broke on the second game
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the weight and feel of these, perfect for playing on the beach. Unfortunately one broke in the second game. Maybe there are just some bad ones but didn't want to take a chance on an exchange just to have the same thing happen so I got a refund. If the company had better quality control these would be great.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent qualify for an excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent qualify for an excellent value! I've paid way more for a set that doesn't stand up to these. As much as $300 for a "traditional Set" in my past. But these come in a slight bag and easy to store, carry and balls feel great in your hand. And work like a champ to beat your opponent! Hands down the highest qualify value I've seen on a set of Bocce Balls. Even traditionalists will enjoy the feel and touch of playing a game with these.
customer_reviews.author: Tarheelsonly

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly fun game
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for a camping trip. The instructions gave a certain amount of suggested space available but it's really adjustable. The more people that play, the more fun it is but we played with as few as four and it was still great. The bag isn't protective at all and playing the game bangs the balls off each other so they got scratched up but I'm sure there are many years of play left in the set. Also, fyi, with all the balls in the bag, it's heavy to carry very far.
customer_reviews.author: frances martinez

customer_reviews.title: Nice weight, seem very durable
customer_reviews.text: Have only had for a couple weeks and played twice with them but they are really nice so far. Nice heavy weight and the quality seems very good. The bag they come with is a bit of a joke though. We needed to cut the top off the cardboard box that was in it and leave it inside the nylon bag otherwise there’s no structure to the bag and the weight of the balls makes them all roll to the sides so it’s annoying to try to zip it up.
customer_reviews.author: Treehugger

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: Great game. The pieces got scratched up from using in an area with a lot of rocks, but doesn't affect function a all. No broken balls yet, crossing fingers. The carry bag doesn't really work that well. It had cardboard in there to hold the pieces into the cube shape of the bag during shipping, but after removing the cardboard, the bag can't be stacked or easily placed on a shelf any more. Might as well be shaped like a typical bag.
customer_reviews.author: Brianosaurus

customer_reviews.title: Solid set! :)
customer_reviews.text: We're happy with it! I accidentally cut the top of the bag open when I was getting in the box though :-/. I just used black duck tape to fix it up. It's not too noticeable. I think for the price, this works great. It's the heavy kind like I remember from playing this game when I was little. The bag itself isn't anything to oo-ah over but it works well! In truth, we're having an outdoor wedding and wanted to have games available to our guests who wanted them. There are some really "pretty" sets out there but for a yard game but we're not pros or anything. Bottom line, I'd buy again! :)
customer_reviews.author: Aychelel

customer_reviews.title: Great quality set for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this set. The balls have great weight to them so they don’t get blown by the wind at the beach. When they knock each other in play, the balls are not damaged beyond a minor scratch (which is par for the course!). The whole family had fun playing on vacation! My 9 year old cousin had never played bocce before, and not only did he catch on quickly... but he surprised us and totally dominated! A fun set of bocce for the whole family. I absolutely recommend this set. Very good quality for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: This game is so fun! It’s a great game to play with family. We busted this out at a 4th of July party and it provided hours of entertainment. The game is easy enough to play that all family members can get involved (as long as they can roll a ball).
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Marie

customer_reviews.title: Fun for grandkids
customer_reviews.text: Saw in bass pro shop while grandkids here from Georgia. Was able to order thru amazon for less $ and shipped to their house. Grandkids were pleasantly surprised and daughter didn’t have to haul it back from Florida ! Good job grandma!
customer_reviews.author: 97badgirl

customer_reviews.title: One ball broke after four uses.
customer_reviews.text: After using this product on four separate occasions, the resin broke off one of the balls. Upon looking back on older reviews, I noticed many reviewers saying the same thing happened to them. I also noticed that the manufacturer reached out to some of these reviewers a couple of years ago. I used the email address in these responses to ask the manufacturer to replace the broken ball. A picture of the broken ball was included. It has been over two week and I have not heard back from them. This product should never have received all the positive reviews as way too many people have had their balls break.
customer_reviews.author: Ali W

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty but color scratches off easily
customer_reviews.text: These are a nice heavy set and function beautifully however after the first use they are so scratched up and worn out looking. When we went to use them the second time my son seeing them for the first time was shocked to see them so scratched and asking if they were supposed to look like that.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Herbert

customer_reviews.title: Decent set of balls lol
customer_reviews.text: Overall very pleased with these. After the first game though, they got pretty scuffed up but no chips yet. It's best to not throw them too hard or when it's cold out. Then they'll probably break as others have experienced.
customer_reviews.author: Sc33

customer_reviews.title: Missing Pallino ball
customer_reviews.text: Bought an Amazon warehouse version. Balls are dingy and are not polished glossy like they show in the picture. Best part was its missing a ball. Good job warehouse team!
customer_reviews.author: S KBASA

customer_reviews.title: good , but not great
customer_reviews.text: the set is nice but its a bit hard to tell the same color balls apart , only the lines are different , would be better if all 4 sets were different colors
customer_reviews.author: Be prepared

customer_reviews.title: a good value
customer_reviews.text: So Far so good. Seems like a sturdy set but I did caution my son not to launch them hard as that isn't part of the game. as said previously the bag is a piece of crap the idea of putting the box in it works but the zipper bent after the second day but the set if worth the money and the bag is fodder anyway
customer_reviews.author: Tobias

customer_reviews.title: Good Set, Good Price
customer_reviews.text: I'm no bocce aficionado but these balls seem durable, are marked with lines and circles, come in a handy carrying case, and arrived on time. Sounds like a winner to me. Unfortunately for me, a bocce ball looks a lot like the ball my dog and I play fetch with in the backyard so it appears I will never be able to actually play a game without the dog interfering. However, if you're a person who doesn't own a nosy, hard-headed dog and you're looking for a bocce set, this is a good one.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Klebacha

customer_reviews.title: Fun to play, but heavy to haul
customer_reviews.text: I love the game. It is fun and all ages can play without issues. The balls require some heft to them, but once packed up these are pretty heavy. I have some concerns about the balls getting pitted based on how they pack into the bag and I think that some separation when packed up would help prevent this.
customer_reviews.author: Dan DurigTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Great on the Beach
customer_reviews.text: We have had a lot of fun with these on the hard beach sand in Mexico. I see others complain about compliance with the official size and weight or some other such nonsense. Save the money and buy these and have fun. Seriously people!
customer_reviews.author: White Oak Worker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect set to have !
customer_reviews.text: We have already used this set 2 times! We kept the cardboard box inside the bag to add stability to the bag... but balls and jack work great on a pebble court at out public park! Nice set for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy...get fro
customer_reviews.text: If I could give zero stars I would! Not only the day after I purchase this is is 10 bucks cheaper but it’s 10 bucks cheaper for an used product that didn’t arrive dirty!! What the heck!
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great set! Great price
customer_reviews.text: Great set! Great price. Most sets like this are on the higher end, $30-$40, We got this for about $22. The bag is great too. I kept the plastic bubble wrap each ball came in and use it to cushion in between them when travelling. I only wish the bag had separators.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Like that it comes with a carrying bag, but it’s a bit thin for those heavy balls. Balls are good quality
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Furr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for backyard play.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for backyard play. Didn't even get crazy about the layout of playing field. Just throw the ball and play. The case is flimsy so followed another's advise and left the inside cardboard, just cut off the flaps. Stores the balls perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Made my son's day!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas present, open box, was a little hesitant when it arrived as the box was beat up. First time I've ever been concerned, opened it before I gave it, all was well! Thanks Amazon! Great deal.
customer_reviews.author: puket3

customer_reviews.title: Great wedding present and sure not to be duplicated
customer_reviews.text: Great wedding present and sure not to be duplicated. Our niece and new hubby took them to a party and everyone left the bean bag toss and stood in line to play bocce . Big hit!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: We had a great time playing
customer_reviews.text: My family has never owned a Bocce Ball set and I was able to get a good deal on this one. We have enjoyed playing it several times now. It appears to be well-made and I think we will get a lot of use from it.
customer_reviews.author: R Retzler

customer_reviews.title: Good set
customer_reviews.text: Had this set for about a month now. So far so good! Seems durable and well made for playing in the backyard. I like the carrying case it comes with as well.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the family.
customer_reviews.text: Fun game for the family. It's worth buying a nice mid-range set. I bought cheapos last summer and they broke. We always have this in the car when on roadtrips and have a little fun when we stop. It's high quality and the bag is very durable. I highly recommend and actually bought my parents a set for their habitual entertainment life.
customer_reviews.author: brian johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good balls, different colors, poor sack.
customer_reviews.text: Nice set. Balls were more forest green and eggplant purple than red and green, but I like the looks. Bag is worthless as a carrying sack.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a great set for beginning a new hobby
customer_reviews.text: As Expected! Looks like a great set for beginning a new hobby. Everything came in good condition and was pretty much exactly what I ordered. The bag doesn't feel like it will stand up to a great deal of abuse, so I will leave the cardboard box in it for support.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Shattered
customer_reviews.text: These are junk. I got them at Christmas. Used then a couple of times. Third use they shattered. No way to contact the company. Several others have had the same problem with no response from the company. DO NOT WASTE YOU'RE MONEY!
customer_reviews.author: Dave R.

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: If this isn’t regulation size or weight, no one in my family can tell. Good deal for the price. Just be very careful when cutting the box open to avoid cutting the fabric case. There is no wiggle room in the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: cwinkenn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Game!
customer_reviews.text: Great Christmas gift and are great quality. They are the perfect weight and hold up being hit by the other balls, without showing major wear
customer_reviews.author: AMS48

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Our white pallino ball broke the first time that we used it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura A. Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Nice bocce set
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice bocce set. However, if you play on a larger sized court, and you're near sighted like me, you might want to buy another pallino because the one that the set comes with is pretty small.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: We have not used these extensively so long term durability I cannot speak to. They feel great in your hand- nice, heavy, quality set. Vibrant colors and a nicely packaged set. it does require some space and a place to set it up- as advertised a clearly outdoor game. The teens and older kids in the family were especially interested in them.
customer_reviews.author: Becky R.

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality for a fair price
customer_reviews.text: Like others bag is thin and had a rip from a box cutter on the top. Put a big sticker over it. Would keep cardboard box inside of the bag for added rigidity. The balls are nice weight and quality. Except for the tear, very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: M. Klein

customer_reviews.title: Not quite the right size
customer_reviews.text: This set is good for playing with friends and family. If you are interested in playing in a local league and are interested in owning a set to practice with these are smaller and weigh less than what the league will likely use.
customer_reviews.author: Tralfaz

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bocce Ball Set
customer_reviews.text: This has been a perfect Bocce Ball Set. The carrying case makes it easy to take places. Good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Terrible.
customer_reviews.text: Really...6 red 2 Green. You had 3 jobs. Make sure the color was right, make sure there are enough balls, and get it here in 2 days. This is so ridiculously stupid. 4 red 4 green 1 white, can't be that difficult. There is even the pattern for green balls printed on the red ones.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Scott

customer_reviews.title: one of the ball cracked open.
customer_reviews.text: they are beautiful, kind of light compared to other ball I have used before. still they are fun to play with until the knock each other to hard, one of mine broke the third time I played. I can still use them but I was a bit disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Yves.M.S.

customer_reviews.title: Fun family game.
customer_reviews.text: Great set. Have had a blast playing it with family. This set is smaller in sizer than the usual bocce ball set. I am sure it says it in the description but I may have over looked it.
customer_reviews.author: SSkoog

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice set, just was alittle smaller in diameter of ball size then my previous set so it was a bit to get used to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The entire family loves to bocce ball.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these based on a review out of Afghanistan. We also have a very rough area with lots of gravel. I have had these for most of a year, they are getting very dinged up but just on the surface. No, chunks out of them even though it is very rough on our course. The entire family loves to bocce ball. Every BBQ we have a rousing game.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Biz

customer_reviews.title: Great Bocce Set for a Great Price.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I love bocce, so I thought we'd pick up a set. The balls in this set seem a bit smaller than normal, but about the same mass (I haven't compared but I will post as soon as I do). An secondly I'd love for the pallino (or jack) to be different than white to make it easier to see. That being said, they work as expected (I mean it's pretty hard to mess that up), the seem to be very good quality, and the price was outstanding. I'm ordering another set for my parents as we speak.
customer_reviews.author: T. Abele

customer_reviews.title: Broke day 1
customer_reviews.text: I played with with another person on the grass for 30 mins and one cracked. My guess is it cracked when it hit another ball.
customer_reviews.author: Jerad Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of bocce balls
customer_reviews.text: Neighbor has a few sets that have chipped. Mine are for more cautious players so they last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Good balls, bad bag (zipper)
customer_reviews.text: These bocce balls are perfectly fine, maybe even great for what they are. My family recently held a large, casual bocce tournament using these and two other sets; these had the nicest feel/heft by far. My biggest complaint is the bag. The zipper was broken when it arrived and I'm not surprised because it seems pretty cheap. I probably should have tried to return it but didn't want the hassle. Second, more minor complaint is that scratches show on the balls very easily, these already look like they've been around.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Faust

customer_reviews.title: Beaming with Boules
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice go-to game for spur of the moment fun. I keep the bocce balls in my car and bring them out frequently. This is an especially uplifting game for family gatherings.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Colas

customer_reviews.title: If your looking for a kids set then these are great.
customer_reviews.text: FYI, These are not Standard Size or Regulation Size Bocce balls as the Product Description incorrectly states. When I opened the package they looked small so I Googled what the standard size Bocce ball is, which is 107mm. These are 90mm. If your looking for a kids set then these are great.
customer_reviews.author: JohnT in Oakland

customer_reviews.title: bocce! Grab a drink.
customer_reviews.text: not as dyrrable as previous brands ive owned. Pretty ok all the same.
customer_reviews.author: Regular Dude

customer_reviews.title: Great value!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was such a good value all my friends bought it too.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Okamoto

customer_reviews.title: Good balls!
customer_reviews.text: We've only played with them a couple of times but they do what they're supposed to do. There has been no damage to them due to hitting them together.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: The balls break very easily and are not intended for the beach.
customer_reviews.text: The balls break, very easily!!! Contrary to the instructions / description provided, these poorly constructed bocce balls are not made for beach play, and will break if the bocce balls impact one another. This happened within minutes of pulling them out of the bag for use (see picture). Terrible construction given what they are used for. Avoid!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its been sitting in the box for a few month because the weather hasnt been nice enough to play
customer_reviews.text: The pallino ball was not included in the set I bought. Its been sitting in the box for a few month because the weather hasnt been nice enough to play. Opened it up today everything was there minus the White ball.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Good fun
customer_reviews.text: Nice game. Gets my kids outside, although, can cause arguments. (most likely just my kids!) The main balls do scratch very easily, but that is part of the game. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Tutiac68

customer_reviews.title: Where’s the pallino?
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted a backyard bocci set. This isn’t what I was picturing! The pallino is microscopic. Hard to see in grass. My guests have running jokes about it. Just not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: MTM

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend it to everyone
customer_reviews.text: It’s an absolutely fun game to play on the beach my son and his friends enjoyed it very much! I would recommend it to everyone
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Burnside

customer_reviews.title: More colors
customer_reviews.text: Would have like to had a choice of colors but it does the job
customer_reviews.author: j guy

customer_reviews.title: My Bocce Ball set arrived without any problems but it ...
customer_reviews.text: My Bocce Ball set arrived without any problems but it was missing the small 1.5 inch ball now I have to return the whole thing to get a replacement set.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Smith

customer_reviews.title: Is this a joke?
customer_reviews.text: Shredded box inside a shredded box. No receipt. 5 red balls, 4 green balls. Bag was completely torn at the bottom. No white ball. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Set was nice, but cheap flimsy torn bag
customer_reviews.text: The set was great, but I have to give a one star because the bag was clearly damaged prior to shipping. Not worth returning for just the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amberbelle08

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: We are so excited to make this purchase. We have already used but we used on an official dirt court and it has many scuffs. It would be great if it came in a stronger case and an extra white ball.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Solid balls, floppy bag
customer_reviews.text: Solid bocce set and looks and feels very nice. The bag is very floppy and not so great to carry the balls in. We taped up one of the boxes the balls came in and used it as a liner for the bag and the balls stay put better. -1 star for a poorly designed carrying bag. If you're gonna make a carrying bag, don't skimp out.
customer_reviews.author: JWigs

customer_reviews.title: Great Balls....
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set with a carrying bagfor convenience. The item was delivered promptly and the item was brand new no defects. We have had fun playing outside worth this set. The only downside is the color scheme, I would probably be more mindful and purchase a set with 4 colors as the pattern against dark colors is a little hard to see hence the 4 star rating. I don't anticipate needing to purchase again so but w are getting used the set. Happy purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bannie

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: high quality, still all in original packaging. Fun to play
customer_reviews.author: Valarie Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Good Set
customer_reviews.text: This set is pretty good. Balls do not feel cheap. We have already rebounded off and skipped over concrete with only minor scuffing. Should hold up well under normal play. Set is 90mm, which I did not realize. If you are looking for a regulation size set look elsewhere. Carry case is OK. Bottom balls fit well but the top 4 don't stay in place and sort of flop around. Hard to see how the case would rip like other have said it did.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Molloy

customer_reviews.title: Best Bocce Set!
customer_reviews.text: Great Bocce set. Please do yourself a favor and buy a real bocce set like this one, do not buy plastic ones or water filled sets. This set has high quality bocce balls. the only reason i did not give it 5 stars is because the bag is cheap and does not hold the bocce balls well. Otherwise the set is perfect and should last for many many years
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable, well finished. Excellent casual Bocce set.
customer_reviews.text: Solid set; good weight to them, all properly sized balls. Haven't had any issues with brittle construction or cheap manufacture. Would recommend as a solid Bocce set for casual enthusiasts. The bag isn't the greatest as it loses shape easily with so much weight in it, BUT the handles are well affixed and I haven't had it break on me in upwards of 30 uses.
customer_reviews.author: C. R. Heady

customer_reviews.title: Lovely set for players just looking for fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for occasional use for casual play (backyard BBQs and the like). For that purpose, it's super nice. The balls are large and have great weight and heft to them. Too heavy if you have to carry the set far, like on a hike, but for backyard use are as part of an RV's game set, I think it is well worth the money. I bought 2 sets to use in my upcoming "lawn party" style wedding.
customer_reviews.author: StoicPlatypus

customer_reviews.title: Avoid Buying....read reviews.
customer_reviews.text: First day at beach. First game. First broken dream. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: The balls feel nice and heavy. I've played one game so far and I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Fun For Families
customer_reviews.text: We ordered sets for our married children and grandkids. Every family loves playing with it!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Great family & friends game
customer_reviews.text: Great set. Gave less stars on 2 categories due to the carrying case. It’s OK, but a little flimsy
customer_reviews.author: Ann M. Capobianco

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Not a whole lot to say about it. It's a standard set. Works well, looks nice. I kept the box inside the carrying bag so that it maintained shape. Otherwise, happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Clawer

customer_reviews.title: solid bocce set
customer_reviews.text: seems like good quality to me! i like the case for storing too. if you're saying you're breaking them, i feel like you're playing where you shouldn't... btw, bocce by nature is heavy so prepare yourself to lug it to the picnic.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Trademark bocce ball set
customer_reviews.text: Never played Bocce ball before. It's a skill game that must be learn but it's a fun trip along the way. It's enjoyable to play and also to watch. It's a great way to past time with friends.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Nelson

customer_reviews.title: The white ball needs to be bigger
customer_reviews.text: I do not like the little white ball. It should be bigger. You cannot see where to throw the other balls. Needs to be made bigger. Would be more enjoyable
customer_reviews.author: Diana Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: great kid bocce ball set
customer_reviews.text: Love this bocce ball set. It is slightly smaller than the regular size, which makes it much easier for small children to learn and play. Quality has been perfect, I left the cardboard box in the carrying case to keep its form.
customer_reviews.author: Mark H

customer_reviews.title: These are great. i do not know if they are tournament ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great. i do not know if they are tournament size, but i don't play in any tournaments other than the one my 7-year old boy orchestrates in the yard. The balls are substantial. The markings are easy to identify. And the quality overall is great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Manz

customer_reviews.title: Expectations met!  Fun game!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift. Recipients are very pleased with the quality of this product. They've been enjoying the game.
customer_reviews.author: dtopp

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: They are perfect. Great weight and don't feel cheap at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Yup
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Even had to get it back after a divorce. That’s how much I liked it.
customer_reviews.author: J Bunyon

customer_reviews.title: Great Set for the $$$
customer_reviews.text: Great quality set! Very nice finish on all of the balls! I would recommend cutting the flaps of the cardboard box inside the carrying case and use it to house the set, as the carrying case is a little flimsy and the balls would shift around a lot while carrying it around without the cardboard box reinforcement inside. Looking forward to playing at my HS reunion!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wilbur

customer_reviews.title: Cracked after 2nd use??
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my Dad as a Christmas present. Didn't use them until this July 4th at the beach in the soft sand. Day 2 of play, red ball coating cracked off. Less than 2 hours of play. Is this common or did I get a defective set???
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for his birthday- we have a bocce court in our neighborhood. His first comment was "these are smaller than the balls I remember playing with." I don't know how big they are supposed to be, and we didn't measure them. Anyway, we have really enjoyed playing with these! These are heavy for throwing but not too heavy, I think they are perfectly sized and weighted. We play with our adult friends and our friends with kids. The kids can throw the balls too. The balls get scuffed up easily but it doesn't affect the gameplay- just appearance. Also the bag is terrible- leave the cardboard box in the bag for extra support.
customer_reviews.author: Mandi

customer_reviews.title: Great so far and can't beat it for the price!
customer_reviews.text: We've only played a handful of times but it has worked out great so far! Good quality and like the bag it came with. Can't beat it for the price in my option.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: Fun game to play while having a few cold ones, but don't get too daring after too many cold ones! These are heavy and will do some damage! It would be if there were four colors when playing with four teams, but they're easy enough to tell apart.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Saint

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke
customer_reviews.text: Just got this for my husbands birthday. As he unzipped to see what was inside the zipper broke of. I would really like to get another bag for a replacement. Have not played the game yet. Hopefully the balls are better quality than the zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Edwards

product_meta.title: Bocce Ball Set- Outdoor Family Bocce Game for Backyard, Lawn, Beach & More- 4 Red & 4 Green Balls, Pallino & Carrying Case
product_meta.description:
Spend summertime outdoors with an easy sport for kids, teens, and adults with this Bocce Ball Set with Carrying Case by Hey! Play! This lawn game kit features heavy duty resin composite balls and a carrier bag, so you can play in your own yard or take to the beach for some family-friendly fun! Whether mastering this classic game in tournament-style play or enjoying quality time with friends, this set is sure to provide hours of entertainment!

IMPORTANT: Avoid buying counterfeit products and transacting with unauthorized sellers. Look for our logo on the packaging for every one of our products. Hey! Play! is committed to providing the consumer with the absolute best price and value on our entire line of products, which we ensure by applying a rigorous Quality Control process.

AMAZON.COM
Ideal for beginners, this bocce set contains eight bocce balls (four green, four red) and one pallino--all housed in a durable, easy-to-carry nylon bag. The balls measure 3.5 inches in diameter, are made of a poly-resin composite, and feature two different scoring patterns. The pallino measures 1.5 inches in diameter.
feature_bullets: FUN FOR EVERYONE - This go-to complete classic summer sport can be enjoyed by kids, teens, and adults. Bocce Ball is best played on outdoor surfaces such as grass, sand, or dirt.
PLAY ANYWHERE - This set is easy to play on your own lawn or take to the beach, barbeque party, or to the neighbor’s yard with the classic black carrier bag, complete with handles for easy carrying.
QUALITY MATERIALS - Bocce Balls are made with high-quality poly-resin compound material that is crack and damage resistant for long-lasting fun, year after year!
SET INCLUDES - 4 green and 4 red balls with two different scoring patterns of 3.5” diameter, 1 pallino ball of 1.5” diameter, and a durable carrying case measuring 7” L x 7” W x 7” D
SATISFACTION GUARANTEED – Hey! Play! is committed to providing consumers with the absolute best price and value on our entire line of products.
